timeline.message:
A few uuid fixes mapped

Now enigma takes too long decompiling some classes. Weird...

Signed-off-by: liach <liach@users.noreply.github.com>

timeline.bodyText: updateLivingAttributes or updateEntityAttributes maybe? just updateLiving seems to be quite broad in it's targeting
timeline.author: i509VCB

replies.bodyText: update living because this applies to all living (called by updateLeashable as well, which is called by updateBreedable)
replies.author: liach
